text: Inene phakathi kwaBantu beNcwadi kukho abo bakholwayo kuAll창h nakoko kutyhilwe kuwe (wena Muhammad) nakoko kwatyhilwa kubo, bayazithoba phambi koAll창h. Abathengisi ngeeVesi zika-All창h ngexabiso elincinane, okwabo iya kuba ngumvuzo ovela eNkosini yabo. Inene uAll창h Uyakhawuleza ukufaka embuzweni
